additional_info:
Working, Inventory, Furniture, Storeroom, ATE, Telephone, Internet, Network, Intercom, Kitchen, Security, Alarm System, Showcase, Elevator, Heating system: electricity, Hot water: electricity 
 High class office and commercial 5 storey building of New Technology Center with Sustainable architecture and high energy efficiency. Address: David Aghmashenebeli Alley 15th km (across the road from Tbilisi Mall)
Building is equipped with network, telephone line, internet, central heating and ventilation system, security and alarm systems and elevator. Parking for at least 50 vehicles. Exhibition and showroom, warehouse, office, conference spaces and WC and terraces are available in the building. On the 5th floor there are sky-bar and big terraces.

details.address: Tbilisi, Vake-Saburtalo,  Didi digomi, Agmashenebeli alley
